thread.title: Missing roommates found dead, with 1 hidden behind closet
thread.title_full: Missing roommates found dead, with 1 hidden behind closet - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: wcax.com
title: Missing roommates found dead, with 1 hidden behind closet
text:
MANCHESTER, N.H. (AP) - Authorities believe a New Hampshire man killed his roommate and concealed her body in a crawl space behind a closet before he shot himself to death at a Massachusetts motel.
Fifty-seven-year-old Sue Hutchinson of Manchester had been missing since Sept. 20, and Stephen Andrade hadn't been seen since Sept. 21.
Police said the 36-year-old Andrade killed himself at a Motel 6 in Tewksbury on Oct. 6.
Police responded to the apartment on Sunday night after members of Hutchinson's family said they detected a strange odor. Police found a crawl space hidden behind a false wall inside a closet. After removing the panel, they found a body and believe it to be Hutchinson's.
An autopsy is scheduled for Tuesday.
